accountId.description: ID of the account that owns the destination bucket. Recommended to be set to prevent problems if the destination bucket ownership changes.

bucketArn.description: Amazon S3 bucket ARN of the destination.

encryption.description: Contains the type of server-side encryption to use to encrypt the inventory (documented below).

format.description: Specifies the output format of the inventory results. Can be `CSV`, [`ORC`](https://orc.apache.org/) or [`Parquet`](https://parquet.apache.org/).

prefix.description: Prefix that is prepended to all inventory results.
